title: Odd Parity Checker for DWord
name: LGF_IsParityOdd
description:
## Short description ##

The function checks whether the parity of the input variable of type DWord is odd. The return 
value is set to TRUE if the number of bits that are assigned TRUE in the sequence is odd.

input.name: doubleWord
input.description: Variable for which the parity is to be determined.

return_value.description: TRUE: When the number of bits that are assigned `TRUE` is odd
